title: Maydelle, Texas
text:
Maydelle is a small <a href="unincorporated%20area">unincorporated community</a> in <a href="Cherokee%20County%2C%20Texas">Cherokee County</a>, <a href="Texas">Texas</a>, United States, located between <a href="Palestine%2C%20Texas">Palestine</a> and <a href="Rusk%2C%20Texas">Rusk</a> on <a href="U.S.%20Route%2084">U.S. Route 84</a>. It lies at an elevation of 410 feet (125 m).
Climate.
The climate in this area is characterized by hot, humid summers and generally mild to cool winters. According to the <a href="K%C3%B6ppen%20Climate%20Classification">Köppen Climate Classification</a> system, Maydelle has a <a href="humid%20subtropical%20climate">humid subtropical climate</a>, abbreviated "Cfa" on climate maps.
Education.
It is within the <a href="Rusk%20Independent%20School%20District">Rusk Independent School District</a>. On July 1, 1989, the <a href="Maydelle%20Independent%20School%20District">Maydelle Independent School District</a> merged into the Rusk district.
